experience: You and Jean-Pierre both know Lauretta (Laurie) Zerga, Luma Dahlbacka, and 73 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Jean-Pierre worked at Charles Schwab before you started

Oversee technology strategy, development and production support team of 55 people for division with $260B in assets under management, comprised of  money market, fixed income, equity passive and active funds and ETFs- Built proprietary equity portfolio management platform to manage $75 billion AUM, providing increased efficiency and productivity- Migrated $180 billion of Money Market Funds from propritary to SAAS solution- Defined technology strategy, with strong emphasis on Data Management strategy- Converted organization to agile-based methods (Scrum/Kanban)- Converted production support team into 24X7 world class organization

Technology platforms for Mutual Funds, Managed Accounts, Alternative Investments and Insurance and Annuities- Defined and implemented plan to automate and streamline industry's largest Alternative Investment offer/platform- Built B2B interfaces for all Schwab's third party financial product providers

Developed and supported Schwab Bond Source (SBS), the most sophisticated proprietary bond trading platform in the industry.- Improved Trade date reconciliation from 90% (on T+1) to 98% (on trade date) - Increased self-service channel sales from 20 to 60 percent- Helped process 3,000 daily fixed income trades representing $3B in monthly transactions- Doubled business revenue with only 17% increased operations staff- Received 2005 Excellence in Service Award

- Directed two-year Straight-Through-Processing (STP) initiative to implement RTTM with the three Fixed Income clearing corporations (GSCC, MBSCC, NSCC) and implemented regulatory reporting to MSRB and NASD; In order to accomplish this, major changes had to be done to upstream processes and application; built a team, from scratch and successfully completed this complex, cross-platform and cross-systems initiative on-time and on-budget-Implemented major enhancements to Schwab Bond Source (SBS)
Institut Universitaire de Technologie (I.U.T.) Paris V - Paris, France
Institut Universitaire de Technologie (I.U.T.) Paris V - Paris, France

recommendations: Orlando Colamatteo
Technical Director, Solutions Architect, Data at Charles Schwab
April 16, 2016, Orlando reported directly to Jean-Pierre

Jean-Pierre is a knowledgeable and talented technologist that has the ability to get to the core benefits a given solution offers while also accounting for its drawbacks. Maximizing business value was always at the forefront of our discussions during technology evaluation, selection, implementation and post-implementation as well as during discussions around organizational concerns. While working with Jean-Pierre I was given the latitude to grow and improve my skills as both a technologist and a team lead. I was always made to feel like a partner and not just a direct report and found Jean-Pierre to be skilled at considering and conveying multiple perspectives. Jean-Pierre has been instrumental in helping me develop both personally and professionally and I am grateful to have had him as a manager and technology partner.

Tech Lead - O2 Team at Charles Schwab
March 14, 2016, Craig reported directly to Jean-Pierre

I have been reporting to Jean-Pierre for several years now, and he is a great manager to work for.  He is very supportive of the team and provides leadership and transparency.  He gets involved in details, but he allows the team to succeed without micro-managing.  He regularly holds one-on-one meetings with his direct reports to understand what motivates and challenges people, while keeping them accountable for their work.  He is serious about developing employees and is always looking to give opportunities for individuals to learn and grow.

summary: I really enjoy setting technical and organizational vision, strategy and roadmaps: I can sort through the clutter, quickly spot relevant patterns and issues and create alternate ways to proceed. I like to figure out how all the pieces/resources can be arranged to fit together. I have an ability to recruit top talent to my team and boost team morale. I really enjoy building strong, engaged and productive teams. I cultivate potential in others and I really get satisfaction from making people feel worthwhile and valuable. The team’s growth is my fuel. I focus on strengths as a way to stimulate, help them experience success and transform a team into superb.I enjoy and have a proven record in driving/enabling organizations to execute, whether it be building a complex technology platform from scratch to implementing third party SAAS solutions or anything in between.I am a collaborative communicator continually focused on building relationships and enhancing profitability. I have extensive financial services experience and thrive in a fast paced environments. Areas of expertise include:•	Technology Strategy/Roadmap•	Business and Technical Architecture•	Building Technology Platforms•	Geographically Distributed Teams	•	Program Management•	Scrum, Kanban, RUP•	Budgeting & Cost Control•	Organizational Transformation	•	C-Level Relationship Management•	Tech Vendor Selection/Integration•	SAAS, PAAS•	Financial Services Buy/Sell side
name: Jean-Pierre Lochman
title: Technology Executive - Building technology solutions that align with business strategy
